newsitem.title: UK: UK s/a M0 falls to 24.706 bln stg in latest week.
newsitem.headline: UK s/a M0 falls to 24.706 bln stg in latest week.

text.p: UK M0 money supply fell to 24.706 billion stg on a seasonally adjusted basis in the week of November 27, the Bank of England said on Monday.
The week before, M0 totalled 24.837 billion stg.
Notes and coins totalled 24.661 billion stg in the latest week on a seasonally adjusted basis, up from 24.593 billion in the week of November 20.
On an unadjusted basis, M0 rose slightly to 24.742 billion stg in the week from 24.722 billion stg the week before.
